price: 64. Aan Hem behoort alles wat in de hemelen is en alles wat op aarde is. En waarlijk, Allah – Hij is de rijke, waard geprezen te worden.
arabic: لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
